★★★ We are proud to introduce the new COPAHOST killer prices! The best cost x benefit you can find all over the internet. ★★★

Visit our site www.copahost.com

First of all, let me introduce COPAHOST. We're in the business for over 8 years, hosting more than 300 totally owned servers, very well experienced in Shared hosting, VPS servers and Dedicated servers.

COPAHOST operates two Datacenters in Europe: Lisbon, Portugal and Munchen, Germany. It offers a fantastic connectivity all over Europe, Asia & USA.

=== SERVER SPECS & TECH SUPPORT ===

Dual CPU Intel Xeon E5 with 128GB of RAM and 5000 series Core i7 Servers
Enterprise level RAID-10 and SSD RAID-10 disks.
We accept custom orders of VPS Servers with up to 64GB of RAM and 2000GB of disk space.
100 Mbit uplink port

24/7 support tickets, emails, chat, telephone.
